PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The J-V characteristics are shown in Figure 6a and the parameters of J sc , V oc , FF and PCE of the resulting PSCs are summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V characteristics |
| J sc |
| V oc |
| FF |
| PCE |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J sc |
| V oc |
| FF |
| PCE |

Explanation:

* J-V characteristics is not a material property, but a method to measure the performance of a solar cell.
* J sc, V oc, FF, and PCE are all material properties of the photovoltaic cell, which stand for short-circuit current density, open-circuit voltage, fill factor, and power conversion efficiency, respectively.
